question: The Mutual Agreement Procedure (MAP) between India and which country has won the OECD MAP 2019 award for highest agreement ratio?
explanation:
India-Japan Mutual Agreement Procedure (MAP) cooperation has won the OECD MAP 2019 award for highest agreement ratio.
The award has been announced for a pair of jurisdictions for transfer pricing cases, which demonstrates the commitment of India to provide tax certainty and an effective dispute resolution mechanism for the Japanese companies.
